Html:
I know it's probably not much, but you are more than welcome to include my DropDownTreeView control in Ascend.Net.

http://www.codeproject.com/cs/miscctrl/DropDownTreeView.asp

It's an incredibly simple control, if anyone's interested.

Let me know and I can send you the latest version of my source.
-Matt

Thank you,

Sorry to take so long to get back to you. I was finishing a day job project.

Do you want to join the team to add this or do you want me to add it?

Thanks,
Scott
